sources.title: Baba Khaldar 1975 Excerpt
sources.description: Title: Baba khaldar (1975) Directed by: Masoud Asadollahi Date of birth: 1944, Tehran, Iran Date of death: 10 August 2022, Los Angeles, United States Writing credits: Masoud Asadollahi Music: Fariborz Lachini, Ahdieh Badiee, Morteza, Soli Year: 1975 Country: Iran Language: Farsi Color: Black & White Runtime: 124 min.
